pt.whiteroad.plugins.notifications
[Groovy] Interface IChannelSender

interface IChannelSender
Method Summary
void send(Notification notification, java.lang.String destination)

Immediately sends the notification.

 

Method Detail

send

void send(Notification notification, java.lang.String destination)
Immediately sends the notification. Scheduling it if necessary.
throws:
NotificationException - An exception that is thrown when there is an error sending the notification.
Parameters:
notification - - The notification that is to be sent
destination - - A parameter that depends on the underlying implementation, that represents the destination of the notification in the context of a given channel.
